website_summaries.verdict: An excellent alternative to a traditional rocking chair. This glide system chair offers a smooth action and comes with matching ottoman for ultimate relaxation.
pros: Solid wooden frame construction is sturdy and durable
Smooth gliding motion from the glide system, which runs on ball bearings
cons: The screws and hardware aren't as high-quality as we'd like

website_summaries.verdict: A terrific glider and ottoman set that delivers an unprecedented combination of style, comfort, and versatility.
pros: Glider offers ample seating room for immense comfort and support
Includes enclosed metal bearings that allow you to enjoy a quiet rocking motion
Solid wood construction guarantees supreme stability and durability
More affordable than many other glider and ottoman sets
cons: May start to creak and squeak over time
Glider is less stable than many comparable options

website_summaries.verdict: A solid value. Offers compelling features and comfort for a fraction of the price of its competitors.
pros: Sports a wide seat, padded arms, and side storage pockets
cons: It has the tendency to make a squeaking noise after frequent use

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This chair CRACKED in half while I was rocking my child. He and I ended up on the FLOOR! Do not purchase this product!!!!! By the way I ordered this chair in February.
customer_reviews.author: Tequoia Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Have had this chair put together for a little over ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this chair put together for a little over 3 months. One day it broke. My husband took it apart and noticed that one of the pieces was not sitting right because a bearing was jammed so far in that we can't remove it and fix it. Will be contacting the company to see if they will replace the piece and will update this review to let others know how the customer service is.
customer_reviews.author: JBURG7281213

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and cute. After searching for a glider for a decent price for months we picked this for our daughters nursery and our thankfully doesn't squeak or malfunction in any way! It's definitely a great deal, so glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Winberry

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my son and daughter in law as a shower gift. The first night they were home from the hospital the chair cracked in half while she was nursing the baby and sent them both tumbling backwards! I was out of the original warranty as I purchased it for the shower a couple of months prior. However OJ Commerce suggested they could help me with a possible manufacturers warranty if I sent pics. I have sent them twice now and they are being of no help save yourself the mo why and more importantly the risk of injury. This is easlity my worst amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Estes

customer_reviews.title: If it held up my large rear it will hold up yours too!
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, I recommend this for all babies/parents. The chair makes an occasional squeaking sound when rocking which can be easily fixed with a short spray of silicone/WD-40. I am 275lbs and it has held me up just fine, we use it every time before putting baby down. You might want a blanket to drape over the seat as sometimes when you rock the base of the chair rubs the back of your leg in just the wrong spot and can cause irritation. As for the people who had issues with the chair breaking, make sure to check the chair for loose connections every so often to prevent those types of issues.
customer_reviews.author: WheelHorseNut

customer_reviews.title: DANGER If you love your wife and baby, STAY AWAY FROM THIS CHAIR!!! DANGER
customer_reviews.text: This is the most poorly built chair I have ever seen, to think it most likely would be used to rock a baby to sleep and the company still turns this out to the public says a lot about the company. This is not a good quality, not even an OK quality chair. I had to heavily reinforce the chair so its safe to use. The cracks you see in the pictures are right out of the box. Only a matter of time till it cracks the the whole back falls off hurting my wife and baby. These units need to be pulled from production before someone really gets hurt or a baby gets killed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Marguet

customer_reviews.title: SO VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: SO VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! I bought this last minute for a baby shower we're having in 3 days because the chair I was trying to restore didn't turn out right. The chair showed up broken in two different places and paint was chipped in two other spots.. I can repair them but I shouldn't have to! The material is also very cheap looking and not soft at all. All screws that attach chair together are exposed without a cover to cover them. DO NOT BUY THIS ROCKER.....YOU WILL BE VERY DISAPPOINTED!The only good thing I have to say is the shipping was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were initially very excited about the rocking chair. It was very comfortable and seemed to be well made but after a week of use it started to crack at the base. I contacted customer service and it was a bear trying to get them to let me return the rocking chair. we finally were able to convince him to let us return the rocking chair and get a refund. I would have weighed this rocking chair and spend a little extra money on getting a different one that'll last you a longer
customer_reviews.author: Emorris

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months. Before that it was great
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the first six months but then it started squeaking very loudly. Fixed that with a dose of WD40 once a week or so but then the thing just broke. One of the back joints popped out and even if I pop it back in it just pops out again. This is an extremely unpleasant experience when rocking a baby to sleep and now I'm stuck rocking him in my kitchen chair because I don't have any other chairs that rock. So. Initially I loved this chair and it is very comfortable, but it is NOT a long term item.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Benterou

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister-in-law when she was expecting her first baby. That was almost a year ago and she still uses it to this very day! My mother loved it so much that she ended up buying one for her house, as well. Now that I am expecting my first little one, I plan on purchasing another my house. All in all, I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a great glider that has durability coupled with quality. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: with_teeth100

customer_reviews.title: ... cushiony and softest one out there but it looks nice and does its job well rocking me back and ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not the most cushiony and softest one out there but it looks nice and does its job well rocking me back and forth. There's a foot rest that came with the chair and it's pretty good to prop you feet up. I put it in the corner of my bedroom, near the baby's crib, to focus on pumping milk or feeding the baby. It's been 8 months and the chair is holding up well and looks brand new, still. I have no issues with it and highly recommend buying this chair if you don't want to spend too much money but would like a decent rocking chair to rock your baby or just sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Joeyyungrocks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Does not recline
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our nursery, great for nursing and provides adequate support for the baby while rocking. It's used daily for sometimes hours. Noticed a mild creaking after assemble, but all wood needs to settle. Built well, easy to put together and no problems. Fixed creak with a little shot of wd40, and no more problems. I haven't seen any of the bad reviews that were left. Note, the fabric and material is quality. I did cut off the tags because they were long and on every part. Also invest in a can of scotch guard. Apply 2 coats outside of course before use. Glad we did. You'll thank me later!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smells of chemicals but the worst thing about this is that my husband
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I've stopped using it. You get what you pay for. It's very cheaply made. Smells of chemicals but the worst thing about this is that my husband, my mother, my mother in law and myself have all fallen off of it when we stand up to get off the chair. It tips forward. It's very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Carro

customer_reviews.title: Color me impressed!
customer_reviews.text: So this seemed like an easy cheap way to build a nursery in the times of Corona but after I ordered I had some people give me the advice to not buy a rocker without being able to sit in it first. That made me nervous but I decided to give this one a shot anyways. Oh my goodness it’s great. Not much padding, you’d think you’d be able to feel it but oh my goodness it is SO comfortable. My baby isn’t due for another few months but I spend most of my time in this chair anyways because I love it. Highly recommend. Looks just like the picture and it’s very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Chair is average.  Do not recommend third party who provided.
customer_reviews.text: Chair is average for the price point. Do not recommend third party who provided. Terrible (non-existent) communication, poor shipping (lost first and, ultimately late), lack of desire to make customer happy. In the end, I got a chair but, would NEVER purchase from them again. This is the reason for two stars overall...chair is a three star.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was timid buying this chair because of the price and some reviews. Wasn’t sure how much I would like a chair that was so much cheaper than everything else I had seen. I was pleasantly surprised when it came! The materials aren’t the best but it is better than what it could have been for the price. Assembly was SO easy! Literally took about 10 minutes which surprised me. It’s quiet and comfortable. I’m 5’1 and my husband is 6’4 and we both fit in it! If you’re on the fence I suggest you go for it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Seems great at first - wait a few months for the squEAK and the terrible arm cushions
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed wonderful. The chair was easy to assemble and fairly comfortable for my nursing wife to enjoy gliding in. After four months use: the arms cushions flattened. It was suddenly just a piece of cloth on wood. A real bummer. Four more months (8 months into owning it) and the chair started squeaking. Terribly. Like a hemorrhaging turkey chased by Farmer Brown. Try putting a baby down while gliding in a chair that sounds like a mutant chimpanzee is chasing you. Doesn't work well. Oh. And trying to loosen the bolts and WD-40 them doesn't work. Try a rocking chair. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was very concerned about buying this product after seeing some of the reviews. I’m so glad I purchased this. The rocking chair may not be heirloom quality like some apparently were expecting but it’s perfect for our home nursery. The item came quickly, was fairly easy to assemble and free if defects. The chair itself was comfortable and at least perfect size for me, I’m 5’5”. Based on the bad reviews, which seem to not be true in my experience, I purchased the optional extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: We were excited for this product but disappointed after using it the first few times. It’s not awful but it certainly could be made more sturdy and durable. It’s very cheaply made so the foot rest slides away while rocking. Also, we have only used the product for one month and it’s already making intense creaking and cracking noises while in use. The features we did enjoy are the ease of assembly and the pockets on the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Yesilonis

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid glider for the price. We looked at many different gliders from multiple places and the Windsor Glider appeared to be the best value. It was pretty straight forward to assemble. We've had it for a couple months now and we haven't experienced any issues as of yet. The gliding mechanism works smoothly and no creaking noises when sitting or getting up from the chair. The only complaint is the cushions. They're comfortable for what they are, but after an hour of sitting it does start to get a little uncomfortable. Eventually the foam wears down to the actual wood. Also, the chair does have a strong chemical odor the first few days but does dissipate eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: - inexpensive - easy to assemble - fairly comfortable - quiet (can barely ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned about 6 months so far. This is not heirloom furniture and I am not assuming it will last forever! That being said, it has the following advantages: - inexpensive - easy to assemble - fairly comfortable - quiet (can barely hear the bearings) - very light (have taken it up and down stairs multiple times by myself) There were some very minor dent/scrapes on the wood (received in shipping, I believe) but nothing to worry me much. I don't think the cushions and fabric will hold up forever, but as I said, this is really inexpensive for what you get...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: The definition of junk...
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage, don’t buy it! Shortly after purchasing it started squeaking. Although it was annoying, luckily the squeaking didn’t keep the baby awake so we dealt with it. Then, like other reviews mentioned a loud “BOOM” and louder squeaking along with a knocking noise (a rear bushing broke). The chair is still somewhat useable but every time it is sat in or rocked in you have to prepare for the loud “BOOM” because it’s coming, it will scare you and the baby if it happens unexpectedly...I like suspense, but not in my baby rocker...don’t buy this chair!
customer_reviews.author: MTBike12

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfortable, and easy to assemble. The only thing that was tough was snapping the arm chair pads in! But in sure as time goes on, I'll have to replace the padding as it will get worn down, as most furniture padding does. I'm 5'8 and can rest my head back. My husband is 6'0 and he finds it comfortable as well. Evelyn isn't here yet, but whenever she makes her arrival and we spend quality time in the chair, I will update!
customer_reviews.author: Vsweeney

customer_reviews.title: great addition for nursery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our nursery and love it! The colors are exactly like the picture so it was a great addition. My husband assembled it and it was fairly easy. It was nice the ottoman already came put together! The chair is comfortable and is not noisy. My husband is 6'3" and needs to add a pillow if he were to lean back to nap but fits me fine.
customer_reviews.author: gmiller

customer_reviews.title: Works well for us!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this setup every night before bed for about nine months now and have had zero issues. From what I remember it was easy to assemble, just follow the instruction and don’t overtighten. Its fairly comfortable and swings nicely while rocking our son to sleep. I rated 4 stars only because the padding could be more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received this chair, It only took me the first night of use to land on the floor while breastfeeding my baby. This chair is dangerous for a anyone. Do yourself a favor and DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GOOD LOOKING CHAIR. Your or other can get hurt. I hurt my back and my head from the chair fall.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Modern on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy rocker. Normal size. Hubby is 6’0 230 and has plenty of room. His head can rest on the back. Similar to the more expensive one for $400+ just not as comfy...cushions need to be a bit thicker. Overall, ok value. 20 mins to assemble the chair by myself @ 8 months pregnant. Foot rest comes assembled. Love the colors though. Doing a black & white nursery so this should be perfect. Attached photo without light and with light. Color is true light tan, not white (as I hoped).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I liked this chair when I first got it, it made popping noises as I rocked but it wasn’t too noticeable. Fast forward a year and the chair completely fell a part. The wood just starting popping out of the joints and no matter how many times we repaired it, the chair would just fall apart. I rarely write and bad reviews but this chair deserves it. It was a horrible waste of money not to mention unsafe because it can completely break in half while you are rocking your child.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Was great for only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We really like this glider so far. It's nice-looking and reasonably easy to put together. Comfortable to sit in and love the ottoman. Update 1/7/2017: Still a nice looking chair, but it creaks and squeaks a lot now. Update 12/5/2017: A few months ago, it just started falling apart. The pegs just pop out of the holes all the time. I loved this glider for the first 6 months, but it wasn't good after that.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love it. And it’s a very nice addition to my daughters nurser.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was super iffy about purchasing this product because there were quite a few bad reviews about the durability and what not. I have had no issue with this chair. I’ve had it for about 4-5 months now and it’s still in perfect condition from when it came out of the box. I rock my daughter in it all the time and it’s very comfy. Its very nice to breast feed on as well because if you have a boppy it sits perfectly and comfortably on the arm rests of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kimrey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair.  Comfortable and Relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: We have this in a nursery, so it works well for its purpose, but I plan on keeping it anyway because it's so comfortable and relaxing. Beware, though: This chair is for short people! It's kind of low to the ground, so normal for me (5'2") and my husband (5'7"), but our family is tall and has some issues getting out of it! Oh well, we like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Brand new, this thing looks like something you'd get at a garage sale for $20
customer_reviews.text: I used to say IKEA furniture was pretty low quality. This product makes IKEA furniture look like they were crafted by the most experienced wood working artisans in the world. The seat cushion felt like is was made from 100 year old repurposed car wash sponges. The sections that came preassembled looked wrongly done so, but then heavily glued to compensate; Dings, scratches, splinters, you name it. Save yourself the trip to the Amazon shipping center to return this thing and don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't get one of the snaps on the arm rest cover to stay snapped and the cusions do feel kind of 'cheap' but for the price I'm
customer_reviews.text: Took all of 20 minutes to put together start to finish with a 3yo and 8mo 'helping'. Rocks smoothly and quietly so far! I can't get one of the snaps on the arm rest cover to stay snapped and the cusions do feel kind of 'cheap' but for the price I'm happy. Updating my review: ten months later both arms have broken off and I've had to replace the cushions after they became too gross looking to bear. The ottoman died a few months back in a toddler mishap. Overall I'm bummed, didn't even last a solid year (or infancy span- now I have to buy a second to use for a couple more months tops). Waste of money 👎
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glider, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the baby yet, but so far it's been a pretty comfy place to sit. I didn't have an ottoman with any previous gliders/babies, so having one now is a nice plus. The seat cushion is a bit stiff, but I imagine it will wear in (and out) after it begins being used nonstop on a daily basis. Assembly looked pretty easy (hubby did it), and it was put together quickly. The price was decent considering how much use I plan on getting out of this glider.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: After TWO days of use the bottom under the cushion is already coming apart. Now the cushion sinks on the right side. I dint want to take the time to take it apart and send it back. Because that's too much of a hassle. So I will likely get creative to find a fix for it. Purchased this as it was an Amazons Choice item and figured itd be a good choice for our new baby due in a couple months. Unfortunately we should have gone with a more expensive and more sturdy version. I could not find information to contact the seller, so hopefully they will see this and provide an easy fix for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but...m
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker! It was really easy to assemble and get the pads snaps on. The pads are a little more on the firm side, which I prefer. The color is a tad lighter grey than expected but it still matches the décor of my nursery so that's ok. All around, great product. Edited from 5 stars to 3 stars because as my baby got bigger, his head hits the edge of the arm and it's not padded. I didn't consider this (this is my first child) and I would have ordered a different rocker with fully padded arms. I have to keep blankets there when we are nursing and he gets squirmy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Makes squeaky noise after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Eventhough it had some cosmetic defects from the time it arrived, we just ignored it as it was minor. Now after using it for 3 months, recently it started to make some sqeaking noise when rocking it. And that wakes up my baby. We use this chair to put my 3 month old to sleep during the nights. So we are not able to rock the chair and can use it just like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Seat Cushion Is Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy chair. Seems wide which is nice. Side covers have pockets in them which is convenient. My only complaint is the seat cushion. The back cushion is very plush and comfortable but the seat cushion is very stiff and firm. Honestly hurts to sit on it. Had an extra chair cushion so added that to it and is now perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy when I received our glider. I have only sat in it a few times as I am still pregnant but it glides beautifully! Reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is the bottom cushion and cushion on the foot glider is a little stiff and not as soft as I would like but I do not refurbish purchase and very happy to have it in our nursery. Would recommend for someone wanting a new glider but not trying to spend a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be pretty solid and is actually made of real wood and ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this glider. It seems to be pretty solid and is actually made of real wood and not the fiberboard stuff, which really impressed me considering the price. All in all this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was really pleased with the quality of the product for how cheap it was. There are a ton of super expensive rocking chairs out there and I just didn't want to spend that kind of money. This was pretty easy to set up and seems to be fairly sturdy. At least hasn't crashed to the floor with me sitting in it at 36 weeks pregnant so that's a plus. :) Not sure how comfortable it is just yet since I've only sat in it for 30 minutes or so, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cassle

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: After searching many different chairs we decided to try this and see if it works to maintain good posture during nursing and also help with giving a light swing to our newborn to soothe him. This was a good purchase, really like the color( blue) , quality and ease of swing. Comfortable and ths swing does not need much effort, it's so smooth that my baby soothes well while rocking in the chair. This was helpful to maintain posture and support back & legs during nursing my baby. Would really recommend this affordable wonderful yet a simple glider
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wooden glider rocker and ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I can tell that the bottom seat cushion is going to need replacing or reinforcement, I can feel the seat springs through the foam (which is why there is another on top of it in the picture) but it's really very beautiful and comfortable for all of that. It came with the hard part of the assembly done (the glider bottom and the ottoman) and only needed the back and arms put on with the included allen wrench. Then the pads tied on and done. Took perhaps 20 minutes, and I was taking my time.
customer_reviews.author: Senna Vincente

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but not worth a crap. My daughter is 2 months old and we’ve barely used it. Chair completely gave out and sent my daughter and I flying backwards. Emailed manufacturer a month ago and still haven’t gotten a response. Pathetic. Unfortunately Amazon couldn’t do anything since it was over the date range. Please beware what you’re buying... I’d hate to have another personal fall back with a baby in their arms!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable, but has lasted me 3+ years
customer_reviews.text: This glider is not very comfortable, but it does rock and it is a place to sit, so I guess it does the job. If feels flimsy and not well made, however, it has lasted me over 3 years with no damage. Some of the padding has shifted in the upholstery and I haven't been able to easily get it back in place, making the glider even less comfortable. Overall, It looks cute, it feels cheap, but it has lasted me a long time. I'm somewhat satisfied, but I'm looking for a different glider for my second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for! But a little itchy without something to cover it .
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the cost! It’s sturdy, looks nice and is comfortable (mostly). The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because you have to keep a layer of fabric between you and the chair. Otherwise, it’s itchy! The fabric which is very soft, is a little thin, so on bare skin the stuffing fibers can be felt, while rocking in the chair it’s not so fun. I keep a blanket nearby, since I’m often wearing a tank top while using it and just cover it up before sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: LiveLaughLove

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This nursing chair is one of the cheapest we’ve found and, although it looks good and is comfortable, it arrived dented. We spoke to Amazon and all they could offer was to replace it, after we return the damaged one. As every new parent, we use the nursing chair all day, every day and getting a replacement meant a. Being without a chair for several days, b. Dealing with the return of a large item c. Assembling the new chair. This sounded like a hassle and with a 3 days old baby, we just didn’t want to go through it. We decided to keep it and fixed if ourselves but have to say, we were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sophonie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Glider
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble (took 10-15 minutes), and perfectly comfortable for a 200+lb adult with infant. Good quality. I notice there are some reviews of parts breaking off of these (and other) chairs. When assembling, you are tightening hex head screws into wood. If you over tighten the screws and crack the wood, I could see this happening. No need to use that much force to tighten the screws. Assembled correctly, the chair is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Judd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect. My husband said it was fairly easy to assemble - very straightforward. The cushion is very firm and supportive for all those long nights rocking the kiddo to sleep. No damages, gray color is very pretty and white wood trim is crisp and clean. I'd recommend it to any new parents. We literally wore our last one to the ground - it completely fell apart after 3 years of using it every night. This one feels sturdy and like it will last thru the toddler years and down the line for #2!
customer_reviews.author: NGSpring

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but be careful
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this 5 stars! It’s amazing! Comfortable to sit in, looks very smart, easy to rock or sit still whichever you want. BUT and it’s made me a bit worried, we got the chair as a nursing chair and the only issue we have is that if you lean forward in the chair and over stretch even slightly the WHOLE chair tips forward, and once it starts going there is very little to stop it. Thank goodness I found this out before I tried to reach for something while holding my baby. I still love the chair, I’m just a little more careful in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be warned ..
customer_reviews.text: I thought this chair was fantastic .. at first. Not too difficult to assemble & comfortable. However less than a year later, this thing squeaks like a mouse choir. SO. DAMN. LOUD. No amount of WD40 helps either. Occasionally it’ll stop but oh don’t be fooled, it’ll be right back. Might not bother some, but when you’re trying to put a baby to sleep - haha the joke’s on you because this won’t help because the squeaking is so loud, it’ll keep them up. I wish I had purchased another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Over all I like the chair. Easy assembley and a good looking chair. However it's nothing I could could sit in for very extend periods of time. I have to add a blanket or pillow at my lower back to get any kind of lumbar support. The bottom cushion also is different from the rest of the chair and it's pretty noticable physically as well as astetically. We got this for our daughter's room to rock her to sleep, and it works for that just fine
customer_reviews.author: Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a month and the wood started to crack and the swaying joints start to crackle and squeal and the bolts come loose all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I chose this to put on my baby registry due to friend suggestions and it costing less than other gliders and rockers; however, I’m not very impressed. The chair glides well, but the cushions are a little stiff and there’s a gash in the wood. I contacted the maker and sent them all information for a replacement part and have not heard from them or received the piece. I’m disappointed and thinking about just returning it.
customer_reviews.author: lumaroon

customer_reviews.title: JUNK- Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This chair is absolute junk! It didn’t even hold up for a year. A few months after using it, the arm rest came apart- and no, we did not misuse it, in fact we take very good care of our things. Because it was too much of a hassle to return, we bought some screws/glue and fixed it ourselves. After a year of use, the bottom wear the gliding mechanism is, completely broke and is not fixable. This item is of cheap quality and is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair!!! It was easy for me to put together myself at 30weeks pregnant. The chair is also very comfortable. Rocks without squeaking too! So glad I made this purchase I sit in the nursery daily just to enjoy the chair :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: This was a really rocking chair and ottoman set and for the price, I was very pleased. However, it broke before I even gave birth. I literally sat in it to try it out and the entire chair fell apart. It’s not very comfortable but again, for the price, it’s decent. After purchasing, I learned two other friends had the exact same chair and both of theirs broke as well.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Monique

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks nice and was quick and easy to assemble. The seat cushion is not as thick as I would like and I've noticed that I've started having some lower back pain when sitting in the chair too long. I purchased a small pillow to put under my lower back and that seems to have added some support. We did not want to spend a lot of money on a chair for the nursery since we don't plan to use it for more than a few years. This one will be good enough for the short term.
customer_reviews.author: J Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Product’s quality is poor and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these gliders. One gray and one brown. For some reason the gray one started to catch and not work properly. I bought it in January and now, just a short eight months later, it starting acting up. To add insult to injury, the glider was around $130! Unfortunately, Amazon is not able to refund or let me return item because it is out of the refund/replace deadline. This product is not durable and I can only hope that the other one I bought will not not share the same fate as the gray one. Knowing that the glider only lasted eight months, I would not buy this product again and strongly suggest others do not either.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item and it comes in the mail and I opened it up to set it up and the store and the bottom of the rocking chair wood is cracked in half had to superglue it and leave it for looks pretty upset with this item but I didn’t want to mess around with them so I just didn’t follow in a complaint but I’m just now doing reviews on all my purchases so be careful whoever purchases this
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this rocker with footstool but it is very noisy. It squeaks when rocking. I bought it for our nursery to rock baby to sleep but with the noise it doesn’t really do the job. The cushion you sit on is very thin so when I prop my feet up my butt hurts. I’m not a heavy person and weigh 130lbs and had to buy another cushion in order to comfortably sit on it. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd say go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble (2 screws for the back, and 2 in each armrest). The "hardest" part was to clip on the arm pads. Very light weight (I'm 7 months pregnant and was able to drag it on the carpet several times to find the perfect spot for it). The cushions could be better/softer/comfier, but I have a dog that sheds its pound daily so it's not too bad. Seems very fragile (definitely not your grandma's rocker), but for the price, it was a good buy. Plus I'll only probably use it for a couple of months anyway...
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your hard earned money on this chair.
customer_reviews.text: We had this chair a week, before one of the screws in the back on the bottom of the glider popped out. The chair doesn’t work anymore after one week. We tried to fix it, because as I saw it, it was just a screw. We could just put it back. But the makers of this chair, sent it to us with the wood already stripped. The screw won’t go back in. All the reviews that say don’t listen to the bad reviews, ignore them and listen to the bad reviews. I read those reviews and took a leap of faith and look where that left me. Heed the bad reviews. This chair is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: sabirah

customer_reviews.title: This chair is perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for our needs! Arrived on time, the box was dinged up, but everything inside was fine. I can see how some might have problems, the chair does feel like it could use a more solid construction. We have been using it for four months. My wife and I hover between 140-180 pounds, and the chair works fine for us. Comfortable for short stints, which is fine, as this is not being used as an everyday chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, this definitely seems to be the best value for what you get. Husband said it was pretty easy to assemble, took about 30 minutes. It's comfortable without being TOO comfortable (it's pretty upright so my neck starts to hurt after a long time). The glide is super easy and easy to keep momentum going even with feet up on the ottoman. It's not a super sturdy piece of furniture that's going to last us generations, but was just the right price-point for this baby.
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR SANITY FROM SQUEAKING, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This chair is comfortable and exactly what I was looking for. BUT, CAUSES MORE FRUSTRATION THEN ANYTHING!!! WILL NOT STOP SQUEAKING. We have tried to grease everything too!! I hate nursing in it because I can't even rock without waking up the baby or distracting her. I've only used it for 2 months! Weigh about 135 so not overweight! Postpartum mamas, save your sanity and get a chair that won't end up squeeking on you! I about smashed this chair last night during our 2 am feeding. Better off sitting on the floor! So dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey G

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i love this chair, just wish the ottoman cover could come off to be washed because over time it will be dirty. i am going to cover with a vinyl cover though
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this Glider/ great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. This looks great in the nursery. As you can see most everything is from Amazon. The rug, dresser, changing table, shelves, playyard, wall decals and mirror. I would give it a 5 star but I think all colors should be the same price. I paid $119. I would not pay more than that. I feel the color should not increase the price. I recommend this glider. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: **Edit** Easy to assemble, came unscratched and complete which was a relief based on other reviews I’ve read. I love the chair however it’s a little stiff so I had to add an extra pillow for my back and I’m thinking of adding a memory foam pad on the seat. Keep in mind I’m almost due with my baby so everything hurts! But this chair was worth the price definitely.
customer_reviews.author: CoastalKimberly

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair in may, my baby was born in September. I used the chair for LITERALLY ONE month it is now exactly 4 weeks since I gave birth. And this chair is a hunk of trash!!! I went to go sit in it as per our usual evening ritual, and rock my baby, and I leaned back and the damn thing snapped!!! Thank God it was in the corner and the wall caught us otherwise we could have really been hurt!!!! My back is only mildly injured as a result. Don’t buy this piece of garbage. Invest in something sturdier for you and your baby’s sake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for nursery
customer_reviews.text: I researched many rockers before I came across this one. I am so happy with my purchase. It literally took maybe 15 to 20 minutes to put together oh, my husband put it together while I directed of course. This chair is so super duper comfortable. My son seems to love it when I rock him to sleep and I am so beyond happy with my purchase. I highly suggest this to all mommies.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mom
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my husband's daughter when she had her second baby because she needed a glider for the nursery. She said it's perfect! The dark wood matched the furniture she already had and the light cushions brightened it up for a girl's room. She's about 5'9" and said it's very comfortable. The pockets are handy too for burp clothes and what not. Great deal compared to other stores!
customer_reviews.author: HM1SCW

customer_reviews.title: Angel Line Glider w/ ottoman
customer_reviews.text: For the money this seems to be a very comfortable glider. We bought it as a shower gift for my nephews spouse who is going to have a baby. There was one little problem with a missing part. I contacted the company and they mailed me the parts that I needed even though the part wasn't on their list. It saved me sending it back. It was only a small 10 cent piece but I wanted it to be complete. The manufacturer came through in a timely fashion so I give this and them a 5 Star rating.
customer_reviews.author: William V.

customer_reviews.title: A very well made chair and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter in law so she could rock my new grandson baby to sleep. The chair is very comfortable the cushions on it are very pretty. Most of all the chair when you rock it stays in place it does not creep.it is a well made chair no problems with it. She has used it so far for 7 months and it still looks great and it is holding up very nicely . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: S. Folland

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Initially we really liked this chair, used it for the newborn but after one year the side arms are falling off, the back is broken and the rocker assembly is broken. Now having to replace for the second baby but will steer clear of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Literature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous chair. No response from seller!
customer_reviews.text: Received this chair within a week. We assembled the chair and the bottom part cracked immediately after trying it with my infant in my arms after a c-section! Luckily my boyfriend caught us before hitting the floor! I emailed for the warranty and days later still have not received a response. I’ve tried to contact the seller via amazon and no luck. Would not recommend this chair. Baby is now here and I have to sit on a hard computer chair and hope she falls asleep that way.
customer_reviews.author: K05hern

customer_reviews.title: Chair TIPPED OVER onto my back with baby in my arms
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this glider like other reviews mentioned. My sister recommended it, and I've used hers with babies without any trouble. I was shockked when 7 days post-c-section, I scooted to the edge of the chair so I wouldn't have to strain my abs (I'm a size 4 post-pregnancy). When I started standing up, with my newborn baby in my arms, this chair flipped completely over and onto my back. Luckily, I always make sure to have firm footing when I stand up. I was able to keep my baby in my arms and shake off the chair. It was so scary.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Damaged items
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in with a beat up box and many of the parts were damaged. I do not have a way to return it because it came in a huge box and the box is literally falling apart. Also the threding has alot of hanging threads that were not sown in properly. Its really sux because ive been in NICU with my daughter and when we finally got to come home thats what we came home to
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This complaining about the arm not fitting, it's because you're tightening the screws too tightly. If you get everything into place first and then tighten after everything is somewhat assembled there are no issues. Very comfortable glider, decent size and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy with my purchase (:
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! Just what I needed. I bought this as a second rocking chair for my master bedroom. My nursery I bought another recliner which was double the price, and this rocking chair is way more comfortable. Will highly recommend it. The price and quality is worth it. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: blanca suarez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I am 34 weeks pregnant and this was probably one of the easiest pieces of furniture I have ever put together. It took me about 20 minutes. The buttons for the cushions were quite difficult to snap together but other than that it was easy. The cushions could be a bit better quality but for the price they’re not bad. I’ve tested it out and it is quite comfy. It is very soft and rocks really smooth. Babe is due until next month and I’m excited to use it to rock him to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: JBMatt

customer_reviews.title: The baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter to rock her baby. She said it went together very easily and has been great to rock the baby. It's not a huge chair which works for our space. It glides very easily, both the chair and ottoman. I picked a glider over a rocker because of our space. This chair sits more upright than a rocker and takes less space.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair!
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE THIS ROCKING CHAIR! I gained quite a bit of weight after giving birth and this chair comfortably holds my hips and I feel like its very sturdy. The gliding motion is comforting and I love the footrest. As a healing mom and being home with a newborn, this chair brings comfort to both mommy and baby. Would definitely buy again! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the most flimsy chair I have ever bought. I knew I wasn’t getting quality because of the price, but this is ridiculous. The back completely snapped off the first time I laidback in it and I am not a big person. I wish I could get my money back for this but I don’t have a big box or the time to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amore

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: The only negative remark is that the quality of the cushions seems a little cheap, but they’re holding up so far. And God love whoever thought to ship with the ottoman pre-assembled so my pudgy, pregnant self would have something comfortable to sit on while assembling the rest of the glider.
customer_reviews.author: Cas McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a GREAT buy! So easy to assemble. I’m sure there are probably more complicated and sturdier versions of this but this was perfect for our budget and we haven’t had a single flaw yet. I was worried not going for an expensive chair we could be dealing with some instability but my husband was rocking back-and-forth in it like crazy and he said he didn’t get any sense that it would topple over or break.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, just worry about durability.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for a few days now, after the first one I ordered arrived broke . I really like it! Although the string tie on the back of the seat cushion has already ripped. But its comfy and it puts my 6 month old son to sleep really fast. 4 out of 5 stars do to it ripping after a few days of use. I worry about the over all fabric durability.
customer_reviews.author: Allecia Powers

customer_reviews.title: Solid rocker and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son and daughter-in-law as they were expecting their first baby! At 9 months pregnant my daughter-in-law put this together herself. It comes mostly assembled. They live is a small apartment and this rocker is not bulky. I was pleasantly surprised when I saw it that it was not a "piece of junk". I was hesitant to order it b/c of the low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Nicea Demers

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within a year
customer_reviews.text: This chair fell apart within a year. We used it to nurse the baby in and lightly rock her to sleep, but now both sides of the arm attachments broke off and the back is almost about to fall off as well. Even before it broke, we didn't love it because the fabric is super itchy against bare skin and the padding is not very thick or comfortable. Also, the chair is somewhat narrow so it gets very hard to breastfeed baby in it after 6 months or so, once they start getting a little longer. Wish I had splurged more for better quality instead of having to buy another chair so soon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again 100%
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chair. My husband put it together (box opening to clean up) in 20 minutes. Super comfortable and relaxing. The only downside was when I moved it into baby's room I hit a wall and it scraped a small section of paint off one of the legs. Can be fixed with a chalk pen I’m sure. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alivia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Check under the fabric covering the springs if you think you’re missing snaps
customer_reviews.text: The chair looks nice in my nursery. Baby hasn’t come yet, so I can’t comment on the durability. We had to contact the seller because we thought we were missing some snaps for the arm rest cushions. Turns out, the snaps were hidden underneath the white fabric covering the springs. Hope our mistake helps others find these snaps!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The reviewers were right - it’s quick and easy to assemble, and it looks beautiful in my living room. It’s also as comfortable as I could have imagined. I don’t know how well the fabric or foam cushions will hold up, but I can easily replace or cover. Very nice piece for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: They’re happy with this gift!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for friends from their baby shower registry. They said it was easy to assemble and they’re very happy with it. (They just put it into the baby’s room so we can’t speak to the durability...) I thought the price was a little steep and shipping took quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair so much! I was able to assemble it solo while 8 months pregnant and its survived a year's proper use (ie feedings, rocking back to sleep, story time), a 5 year old and now toddler rough housing with it, and my husband being a "plopper". I love the little pockets on the outsides for holding bottles, feeding journal, burp cloths, etc. This glider was everything I could've hoped for. And to the 180lb man that had it break: I got up to 215lbs with my second child and this chair still holds up. I'm currently writing this with my 40lb son and 28lb daughter on my lap with not even a squeak from the chair :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: NOT GREAT 👎
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bc of the reviews and how it’s been selling out quickly. This rocking chair isn’t so great. It was confusing to set up the chair bc the instructions they give you isn’t informative. I had to have 2 helper to set it up for me. The holes on the chair was NOT equal at all and my helpers had to find another way to make it more stable so the back part of the chair doesn’t fall off! Sadly this rocking chair won’t last me for a year only probably a few months before it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaotang Yang

customer_reviews.title: Quite surprised that I like this so much
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised that I like this so much. I was worried that the affordable price would leave me with a substandard product, but it really is very nice! Looks great, glides smoothly. The only thing I don't like is the chair pad. I think it is too thin and will wear quickly. I plan to simply purchase a separate cushion when it begins to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rocking chair. So cute and modern! My daughter is one month and needs to be constantly rocked and this has saved my life! So comfortable too and so easy to assemble. Took my husband less than 10 minutes to put everything together. Totally recommend and will totally buy another one. I'm also gonna buy this for friends who are expecting. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Malizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Easiest piece I’ve assembled
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to assemble, I did it in about 15 minutes. It takes almost no work and it is surprisingly comfortable or the price and ease of assembly. It isn’t the highest quality piece of furniture by any means. I don’t think it will last for years to come however it’s comfy and it looks very good in our nursery
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but back scratched
customer_reviews.text: This is the second glider I've had and I love the easy assembly and comfort. However, the back piece was scratched and I didn't realize until I had it assembled. As it was sent to Amazon through the manufacturer, they were unable to send me a replacement piece, and wanted to replace the entire chair instead. I fault quality control on the manufacturer's part, please check your pieces before assembling!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Evans

customer_reviews.title: stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I've hesitated a lot before making this purchase because of the reviews however my experience has been great so far. I really hope that it doesn't start making sounds, it's been totally fine so far. The only negative thing might be the thinness of the pillows and maybe lack of a back pillow but those are not big deals for me. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Omer

product_meta.title: Windsor Glider and Ottoman, White with Gray Cushion
product_meta.description: Color:White and GrayThis "Windsor Glider with Ottoman" is the perfect product to complete your nursery. It has enclosed metal bearings for smooth gliding motion, generous seating room with padded arms and pockets for extra storage. Do not sit on the edge of the seat, armrests or on the backrest as this could cause the chair to tip over.
feature_bullets: Generous seating room with padded arms and storage pockets
Removable chair cushions for easy spot cleaning
Windsor glider and matching ottoman in white finish with gray cushions. Fabric Care Instructions - Do not machine wash, Spot Clean
The glider and ottoman pieces have solid wood frames for stability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,265 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
